title: Major service disruption on the North-South Line due to track fault and tunnel flooding

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Free regular bus and bridging bus services have ended.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train services in both directions btwn #AngMoKio & #Newton have resumed. Free bus & bridging bus svcs are still available.
[NSL] UPDATE: Our teams are working on cleaning and testing trackside equipment btwn #AngMoKio and #Newton before train services resume.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free bus & bridging bus svcs are avail btwn #Newton & #Ang Mo Kio. Our staff at bus boarding points will assist you.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free regular & bridging bus svcs btwn #Orchard and #MarinaSouthPier have ended while btwn #AngMoKio and #Orchard are avail.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #Newton in both directions are not avail till end of svc. We're working to resume svcs for Sun.
[NSL] UPDATE: Train svcs btwn #Newton & #MarinaSouthPier have resumed. There is no train svc btwn #AngMoKio & #Newton.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train svc btwn #AngMoKio & #MarinaSouthPier. Pls seek alternative transport or continue your journey via other MRT lines.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free regular bus & bridging bus svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #MarinaSouthPier. We are sorry and are working to recover service.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train svc btwn #AngMoKio and #MarinaSouthPier. Pls seek alternative transport. Bus guides here: https://t.co/xm0TV4199t
[NSL] UPDATE: No train svc btwn #AngMoKio and #MarinaSouthPier. Pls consider alternative transport.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train svc btwn #AngMoKio and #ToaPayoh due to a track fault at #Bishan.
[NSL] Due to a track fault, there is no train svc from #Bishan to #ToaPayoh towards #MarinaSouthPier. (Not linked to new signalling project)
